channel.title: Book on Hi there!
channel.description: Recent content in Book on Hi there!

item.title: Unsupervised Learning Approaches for Dimensionality Reduction and Data Visualization
item.description: Why this book was written? Dimensionality reduction is a mainstay of modern data analysis - a black box that is widely used but sometimes poorly understood. I, along with my co-authors, Dr. Tripathy and Anveshritha aim to dispel the magic behind this blackbox. This book focuses on building a solid intuition for how and why Unsupervised learning algorithms work for Dimensionality reduction. We attempted to crystallize this knowledge by deriving from simple intuitions, the mathematics behind all the algorithms.

This book focuses on building a solid intuition for how and why Unsupervised learning algorithms work for Dimensionality reduction.
